categories: Category:Imperial Navy officers of Darth Krayt's Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Gurlok was a Human Imperial Navy captain who followed Cade Skywalker and his crew to the planet Iego in 137 ABY. He led a detachment of stormtroopers into the planet and interrogated Azlyn Rae, and threatening to kill Micah, Skeeto and Ahnah to make Bantha Rawk and Droo reveal Cade's location. However, Rae herself drove him away by using a mind trick on him.
